explains: adj. 空闲的；没人住的；未占领的；无人占领的

sentences.en: I sat down at the nearest unoccupied table.
sentences.cn: 我在最近的一张空桌旁坐了下来。

sentences.en: The house was unoccupied at the time of the explosion.
sentences.cn: 爆炸时这座房子里没有人。

sentences.en: The house was unoccupied and in a bad state of disrepair.
sentences.cn: 这间房子没有人住，并且破损严重。
